Hello!

We are trying swerve for the first time with YAGSL using Neos and Sparkmaxs and could use some assistance troubleshooting. Right now it looks like a couple of our wheels just spin. We’ve updated to latest of the yagsl example project but we are at a loss and not sure what to check next.

  • The swerve modules we are using
  • Our Code

I have discovered an issue with this today with the help of 2377 and it should be fixed in an upcoming release. If you update it to 2025.3.0-beta2 it might work!
